name: Tecriti Consulting
tag_list: odesk, web-solutions, mobile-applications, branding, web-development, open-source, joomla, wordpress, drupal, e-commerce, business
overview:
TECRITI Consulting (P) Ltd. (previously Mudra IT) is a global Information Technology Consulting & Internet Software Services company based in Cochin, India with a client base spread across 35 countries worldwide. We are focussed on the development of High End Web Applications, Open source & Enterprise CMS Solutions, Rich Internet Applications, Web 2.0 solutions, Social Networking Applications, eLearning Management Systems, Web Based CRM & ERP Solutions, e Commerce Applications, SEO and Internet marketing services.

Our Project Management and design expertise and commitment to client satisfaction distinguish us from other web development companies. We are passionate about our work and will strive to solve our client needs. We take a personal interest in the success of our clients and work collaboratively to ensure that the end product is something to be proud of, which fulfils client objectives. We believe in rendering only the best software solutions for our clients with emphasis on outstanding quality and performance.

We believe that IT driven business innovation, emergence of new disruptive web technologies, business models, and widespread acceptance of global delivery models are some of the transformational forces at work today. Everyone’s talking transformation these days and we will always be there to transform and upgrade your business to new heights by providing ‘value-centric’ web solutions.
